channel.title: Mac Users
channel.description:
I know, I know, you guys are gonna flame this, but this is a tutorial for mac users on how to run mods [quote] Steps for installing on Mac OSX, courtesy of Macocha:
1. Extract the mod and place it in: (Home)/Library/Application Support/Steam/SteamApps/sourcemods/ You need to add a symlink to it in your hl2 directory. Like this: 2.a. Open Terminal 2.b. Navigate to the hl2 dir: cd /Users/<Yourname>/Library/Application\ Support/Steam/SteamApps/<SteamID>/half-life\ 2/ 2.c. Make symlink: ln -s ../../sourcemods/<Yourmodname>/ <Yourmodname> Now you can run your game from terminal! Just enter: 3.a. export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users/<Yourname>/Library/Application\ Support/Steam/SteamApps/<Yourname>/half-life\ 2/bin:/Applications/Steam.app/Contents/MacOS/osx32 3.b. ulimit -n 2048 3.c. ./hl2_osx -steam -game <Yourmodname> [/quote] Please note, the mod name must have NO SPACES. And you have to enter all of the terminal commands each time you run the mod

item.title: Mac Users
item.dc:creator: Zorc
item.description:
I know, I know, you guys are gonna flame this, but this is a tutorial for mac users on how to run mods

Steps for installing on Mac OSX, courtesy of Macocha:

  1. Extract the mod and place it in: (Home)/Library/Application Support/Steam/SteamApps/sourcemods/
    You need to add a symlink to it in your hl2 directory. Like this:
    2.a. Open Terminal
    2.b. Navigate to the hl2 dir: cd /Users//Library/Application\ Support/Steam/SteamApps//half-life\ 2/
    2.c. Make symlink: ln -s …/…/sourcemods//
    Now you can run your game from terminal! Just enter:
    3.a. export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users//Library/Application\ Support/Steam/SteamApps//half-life\ 2/bin:/Applications/Steam.app/Contents/MacOS/osx32
    3.b. ulimit -n 2048
    3.c. ./hl2_osx -steam -game

Please note, the mod name must have NO SPACES. And you have to enter all of the terminal commands each time you run the mod
